by.tc.auction.service.admin_operation

Interface AdminOperationService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdminOperationServiceImpl

    public interface AdminOperationService
    An interface of administrator operations. An interface provides methods for an administrator working in an application logic and in a source.
    Author:
    semenovich

    • Method Detail

      • blockUser

        boolean blockUser(java.lang.String userLogin)
           throws ServiceException
        Blocks a user by a login. In the method the same DAO method should be used.
        Parameters:
        userLogin - - a user login.
        Returns:
        true - if a user has been blocked. false - if a user hasn't been blocked.
        Throws:
        ServiceException - - if an error occurred during operation.

      • unblockUser

        boolean unblockUser(java.lang.String userLogin)
             throws ServiceException
        Unblocks a user by a login. In the method the same DAO method should be used.
        Parameters:
        userLogin - - a user login.
        Returns:
        true - if a user has been unblocked. false - if a user hasn't been unblocked.
        Throws:
        ServiceException - - if an error occurred during operation.

        Returns:

      • unblockLot

        Returns:
